1.0.name: wordpress/flashnews-fading-effect-pearlbells
1.0.description:
Do you want to display flash news concisely in your webpage and link it to the main page? This plugin helps to display flash news in your Wordpress website. You can link your news to the different webpages using the read more link button.You can display as many news as you want as a loop. It is possible to customise the look and feel of the flash news area from the backend administrator area.

Live Demo - Click here How to install - Click here

  • can set the width and height of the flash news area.
  • can set background color of the flash news area.
  • can set border color and border width of the flash news area.
  • can set font color and font size.
  • can set letter spacing.
  • can set delay / speed between each flashing news.
  • can add as many
